We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AugenPriceSpike _aps;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_aps = APS(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_aps.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "APS Current", _aps.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.aps = self.APS(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.aps.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APS Current", self.aps.Current);
